editor.label: Application server - IIS checkserverstatus
editor.description: Checks the status of the specified server.

formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server. In this case, only credentials are taken from the configuration if the 'Use Credentials' parameter is checked. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server. In this case, only credentials are taken from the configuration if the 'Use Credentials' parameter is checked.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Use Credentials (DEPRECATED):
formElement.documentation: Indicate if credentials must be used. If checked, the CloudBees CD use the user and password typed in the configuration.

formElement.label: Credential:
formElement.documentation: Specify username and password for check. Will be used for basic authentication.

formElement.label: Link to Check For:
formElement.documentation: Url to check. If not given, one will be constructed from IIS conf.

formElement.label: Expected Status:
formElement.documentation: 3-digit HTTP status to wait for. Default is 200. Can be regular expression, e.g. 200|201.

formElement.label: Check Unavailable:
formElement.documentation: If checked, the server:port will just be checked for availability and URL path and status parameters will be ignored. If server is available, the procedure will fail.

formElement.label: Retries:
formElement.documentation: Specify number of retries. Default is 1. This only affects connecting to server, NOT the status returned by server.
